bio: Aaron Horkey is an American artist and printmaker known for his detailed and ornate artwork, often incorporating elements of surrealism and nature. Horkey is an acclaimed and exhibited artist who also works on musical album covers, movie and concert posters, and magazine illustrations. He is known for his intricate and labor-intensive printmaking techniques, which often involve multiple layers and hand-drawn elements. Horkey is also the founder of the art studio and print shop Burlesque of North America, which produces limited-edition prints and other artwork.
